name: Five
body: # five.js A library to overcomplicate `5`. [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jackdcrawford/five.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jackdcrawford/five) [![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/jackdcrawford/five.png)](https://codeclimate.com/github/jackdcrawford/five) [![Test Coverage](https://codeclimate.com/github/jackdcrawford/five/coverage.png)](https://codeclimate.com/github/jackdcrawford/five) DONATE: [Give us five](https://www.paypal.me/fivejs/5/) > *Seriously, we'll be printing stickers and mailing to all contributors of the project. All remaining money will be passed on to a charity.* ### Usage ##### Require the module ```javascript var five = require('five'); ``` ##### In the browser ```html ``` ##### Basic 5 ```javascript five(); // 5 ``` ##### Addition ```javascript five() + five(); // 10 ``` ##### Multiplication ```javascript five() * five(); // 25 ``` ##### Division ```javascript five() / five(); // 1 ``` ##### Different sorts of 5 ```javascript five.upHigh() // ‚Åµ five.downLow() // ‚ÇÖ five.tooSlow() // 5, with a ~500 millisecond delay five.roman() // V five.morseCode() // ..... five.negative() // -5 five.loud() // FIVE five.loud('piglatin') // IVEFAY five.smooth() // S five.mdFive() // 30056e1cab7a61d256fc8edd970d14f5 ``` ##### 5 goes multilingual ```javascript five.arabic() // ÿÆŸÖÿ≥ÿ© five.azerbaijani() // be≈ü five.basque() // bost five.belarusian // –ø—è—Ü—å five.bosnian() // pet five.bulgarian() // –ø–µ—Ç five.catalan() // cinc five.chinese() // ‰∫î five.choctaw() // tahlapi five.croatian() // pet five.czech() // pƒõt five.dothraki() // mek five.dovah() // hen five.dutch() // vijf five.elvish() // lempe five.english() // Five five.estonian() // viis five.finnish() // viisi five.french() // cinq five.german() // f√ºnf five.greek() // œÄŒ≠ŒΩœÑŒµ five.hebrew() // ◊ó◊û◊© five.hindi() // ‡§™‡§æ‡§Ç‡§ö five.hungarian() // √∂t five.icelandic() // fimm five.indonesian() // lima five.irish() // c√∫ig five.italian() // cinque five.japanese() // ‰∫î five.kannada() // ‡≤ê‡≤¶‡≥Å five.klingon() // vagh five.korean() // Ïò§ five.latin() // quinque five.latvian() // pieci five.lithuanian() // penki five.mongolian() // —Ç–∞–≤–∞–Ω five.norwegian() // fem five.persian() // ŸæŸÜÿ¨ five.piglatin() // ivefay five.polish() // piƒôƒá five.portuguese() // cinco five.romanian() // cinci five.russian() // –ø—è—Ç—å five.serbian() // pet five.slovakian() // p√§≈• five.slovenian() // pet five.spanish() // cinco five.swedish() // fem five.tamil() // ‡Æê‡Æ®‡Øç‡Æ§‡ØÅ five.telugu() // ‡∞ê‡∞¶‡±Å five.thai() // ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏≤ five.turkish() // be≈ü five.ukrainian() // –ø‚Äô—è—Ç—å five.welsh() // pump ``` ##### Different radices ```javascript five.binary(); // 101 five.octal(); // 5 five.hex(); // 5 ``` ##### Assertion ```javascript five.isFive(10); // false ``` ##### Filter, Map and Reduce ```javascript five.filter([5, true, 5]); // [5, 5] five.map([1, 2, 3]); // [5, 5, 5] five.reduce([1, 2, 3]); // 5 ``` ##### Novelty ```javascript five.fab(); // ['Juwan Howard','Ray Jackson','Jimmy King','Jalen Rose','Chris Webber'] five.jackson(); // ['Jackie','Tito','Jermaine','Marlon','Michael'] ``` ##### Rotation ```javascript five.rot("five.js"); //"knaj.ox" ``` ##### Asynchronous Usage ```javascript five.async(function(err, five) { // five === 5 }); ``` ##### Unicode ```javascript five.oclock(); // 'üïî' ``` ### Development ##### The code All of the logic & heavy lifting is achieved in one self-contained file: ``` ./five.js ``` ##### Tests ``` npm test ``` ### License MIT
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
